import{useRef}from'react';import*as GameScript from"../Scripts/GameScript";import AnimatedButton from'./AnimatedButton';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Controls=()=>{const nameInputRef=useRef(null);// Clear the input value

const handleInputChange=event=>{GameScript.updateButtonHighlight("name-input","mb1");};// Create a new cat object
const handleCreateButton=()=>{GameScript.createCat();clearInput();};// Create a new cat object
